title: 一个关于MM怪物伪装成花类方块的问题
author: wjx1532280
txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 三角形充电
replies.txt_content:
给你写了两个例子，望采纳.cscs2:
  Type: Skeleton
  Disguise:
    Type: BLOCK
    Block: yellow_flower
    BlockData: 0
    ShowName: true
cscs1:
  Type: Skeleton
  Disguise:
    Type: BLOCK
    Block: red_rose
    BlockData: 1
    ShowName: true复制代码
